app.title: BallsDex Config Filler
app.subtitle: Purely static. By Ray Hsueh.
app.use_desktop_title: Please use a computer to view this page
app.use_desktop_desc: This tool is only compatible with desktop browsers and may not display properly on mobile devices.
app.tip_download: Tip: Press Ctrl + S to download.

hero.title: Generate a perfect config for your Ballsdex bot
hero.subtitle_html: Export your config.yml. If you have any questions, ask in dev server.

fields.discord_token_help_html:
From Discord Developer Portal (How)
If you prefer to paste the token directly into the file, you may leave this blank.
fields.log_channel_help: Enter the Discord channel ID for moderation logs
fields.multi_line_help: You can enter multiple messages, one per line.
fields.additional_packages_placeholder:
Enter additional package names (one per line)
Example:
broadcast
report
fields.packages_help: Enter additional package names without the "ballsdex.packages." prefix. The default packages will always be included.

errors.only_lower_num_underscore: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores are allowed.

footer.notice_tail: may be outdated. Please manually cross-check it with the program-generated file to ensure accuracy.

callout.title: Before downloading this file, complete these steps:
callout.before_html: Follow the official guide to git clone or download the folder. If you use Docker, run docker compose build and make sure a config.yml appears in your project directory.
callout.after_html: When ready, click the download button below and compare both config.yml for any formatting differences. If none, replace the old file with the one downloaded from this site and continue following the terminal instructions.
